price: 5. Yallih angaaraw qaagitaah, kay galtóh sangeela num, tokkel diggah Yalli isi ginóh ugtiyyah xagana kah hee wakti amaatele, kaadu usuk isi ginóh maxcoocá yaabbi, ken taamoomi yaaxigi.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
